headline: Chart Industries (GTLS) Soars 15.7% on $13-Billion Merger, Impressive Earnings
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks With Surprising Gains. Time to Sell? Chart Industries, Inc. (NYSE:GTLS) is one of the companies that stood stronger last week. Chart Industries jumped by 15.70 percent week-on-week over twin news of a $13.6 billion merger with Baker Hughes and an impressive earnings performance in the past quarter of the year. In […]
